spearman_r¶

hydrostats.metrics.spearman_r(simulated_array, observed_array, replace_nan=None, replace_inf=None, remove_neg=False, remove_zero=False)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • simulated_array –
    param observed_array:
     
    param replace_nan:
     
  • replace_inf –
    param remove_neg:
     
    param remove_zero:
     
    return:

Returns the Spearman rank-order correlation coefficient. The rank method is the scipy default, or ‘average’.
